EmailTemplate.name: 17.Core.AirFrame.none.N.G.E.12204.AirFrame Network Planning.Email 1 - Planning f
EmailTemplate.subject: Prepare your cloud for the future with Nokia
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Planning for cloud transformation Ensure your network meets your future needs When moving to the cloud, your transformation strategy needs to ensure your network is more agile, scalable and cost-effective to cope with traffic and service demands – today and in the future. Download our paper, developed in partnership with Heavy Reading, to learn the secrets of effective cloud transformation. Contact me › <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2478.Contact-Us.html]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
